title: United Kingdom Average Weekly Hours
description: Average Weekly Hours in the United Kingdom remained unchanged at 31.90 Hours in August from 31.90 Hours in July of 2022. Average Weekly Hours in the United Kingdom averaged 32.18 Hours from 1992 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 33.50 Hours in November of 1994 and a record low of 25.90 Hours in May of 2020. In the UK, average weekly hours refer to the total weekly hours worked divided by the employees paid for those hours, including full time and part time employees. This page provides - United Kingdom Average Weekly Hours- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Office for National Statistics
